fileSamples.statement: (v : val) (av : aval) (s : shift) (n : amount32) (H : vmatch bc v av) : vmatch bc (eval_shift s v n) (eval_static_shift s av n).
fileSamples.proofString: unfold eval_shift, eval_static_shift; destruct s; auto with va.

fileSamples.statement: (v : val) (av : aval) (s : shift) (n : amount64) (H : vmatch bc v av) : vmatch bc (eval_shiftl s v n) (eval_static_shiftl s av n).
fileSamples.proofString: unfold eval_shiftl, eval_static_shiftl; destruct s; auto with va.

fileSamples.statement: (v : val) (av : aval) (x : extension) (n : amount64) (H : vmatch bc v av) : vmatch bc (eval_extend x v n) (eval_static_extend x av n).
fileSamples.proofString: unfold eval_extend, eval_static_extend; destruct x; auto with va.

fileSamples.statement: (cond : condition) (vargs : list val) (m : mem) (aargs : list aval) (VM : list_forall2 (vmatch bc) vargs aargs) : cmatch (eval_condition cond vargs m) (eval_static_condition cond aargs).
fileSamples.proofString:
inv VM.
destruct cond; auto with va.
inv H0.
destruct cond; simpl; eauto with va.
replace (Val.cmp_bool Ceq (Val.and a1 (Vint n)) (Vint Int.zero))     with (Val.maskzero_bool a1 n) by (destruct a1; auto).
eauto with va.
replace (Val.cmp_bool Cne (Val.and a1 (Vint n)) (Vint Int.zero))     with (option_map negb (Val.maskzero_bool a1 n)) by (destruct a1; auto).
eauto with va.
inv H2.
destruct cond; simpl; eauto with va.
destruct cond; auto with va.

fileSamples.statement: (cond : condition) (m : mem) : cmatch (eval_condition cond nil m) (eval_static_condition cond nil).

(cond : condition) (m : mem) (a1 : val) (al : list val) (b1 : aval) (bl : list aval) (H : vmatch bc a1 b1) (H0 : list_forall2 (vmatch bc) al bl) : cmatch (eval_condition cond (a1 :: al) m)
  (eval_static_condition cond (b1 :: bl)).
fileSamples.proofString:
inv H0.
destruct cond; simpl; eauto with va.
replace (Val.cmp_bool Ceq (Val.and a1 (Vint n)) (Vint Int.zero))     with (Val.maskzero_bool a1 n) by (destruct a1; auto).
eauto with va.
replace (Val.cmp_bool Cne (Val.and a1 (Vint n)) (Vint Int.zero))     with (option_map negb (Val.maskzero_bool a1 n)) by (destruct a1; auto).
eauto with va.
inv H2.
destruct cond; simpl; eauto with va.
destruct cond; auto with va.

fileSamples.statement:
(cond : condition) (m : mem) (a1 : val) (b1 : aval) (H : vmatch bc a1 b1) : cmatch (eval_condition cond (a1 :: nil) m)
  (eval_static_condition cond (b1 :: nil)).
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct cond; simpl; eauto with va.
replace (Val.cmp_bool Ceq (Val.and a1 (Vint n)) (Vint Int.zero))     with (Val.maskzero_bool a1 n) by (destruct a1; auto).
eauto with va.
replace (Val.cmp_bool Cne (Val.and a1 (Vint n)) (Vint Int.zero))     with (option_map negb (Val.maskzero_bool a1 n)) by (destruct a1; auto).
eauto with va.

fileSamples.statement:
(n : int) (m : mem) (a1 : val) (b1 : aval) (H : vmatch bc a1 b1) : cmatch (Val.cmp_bool Ceq (Val.and a1 (Vint n)) (Vint Int.zero))
  (maskzero b1 n).
fileSamples.proofString:
replace (Val.cmp_bool Ceq (Val.and a1 (Vint n)) (Vint Int.zero))     with (Val.maskzero_bool a1 n) by (destruct a1; auto).
eauto with va.

fileSamples.statement: (n : int) (m : mem) (a1 : val) (b1 : aval) (H : vmatch bc a1 b1) : cmatch (Val.maskzero_bool a1 n) (maskzero b1 n).

(n : int) (m : mem) (a1 : val) (b1 : aval) (H : vmatch bc a1 b1) : cmatch (Val.cmp_bool Cne (Val.and a1 (Vint n)) (Vint Int.zero))
  (cnot (maskzero b1 n)).
fileSamples.proofString:
replace (Val.cmp_bool Cne (Val.and a1 (Vint n)) (Vint Int.zero))     with (option_map negb (Val.maskzero_bool a1 n)) by (destruct a1; auto).
eauto with va.

fileSamples.statement: (n : int) (m : mem) (a1 : val) (b1 : aval) (H : vmatch bc a1 b1) : cmatch (option_map negb (Val.maskzero_bool a1 n)) (cnot (maskzero b1 n)).

(cond : condition) (m : mem) (a1 : val) (b1 : aval) (H : vmatch bc a1 b1) (a0 : val) (al0 : list val) (b0 : aval) (bl0 : list aval) (H1 : vmatch bc a0 b0) (H2 : list_forall2 (vmatch bc) al0 bl0) : cmatch (eval_condition cond (a1 :: a0 :: al0) m)
  (eval_static_condition cond (b1 :: b0 :: bl0)).
fileSamples.proofString:
inv H2.
destruct cond; simpl; eauto with va.
destruct cond; auto with va.

fileSamples.statement:
(cond : condition) (m : mem) (a1 : val) (b1 : aval) (H : vmatch bc a1 b1) (a0 : val) (b0 : aval) (H1 : vmatch bc a0 b0) : cmatch (eval_condition cond (a1 :: a0 :: nil) m)
  (eval_static_condition cond (b1 :: b0 :: nil)).
fileSamples.proofString: destruct cond; simpl; eauto with va.

fileSamples.statement:
(cond : condition) (m : mem) (a1 : val) (b1 : aval) (H : vmatch bc a1 b1) (a0 : val) (b0 : aval) (H1 : vmatch bc a0 b0) (a2 : val) (al : list val) (b2 : aval) (bl : list aval) (H0 : vmatch bc a2 b2) (H3 : list_forall2 (vmatch bc) al bl) : cmatch (eval_condition cond (a1 :: a0 :: a2 :: al) m)
  (eval_static_condition cond (b1 :: b0 :: b2 :: bl)).
(id : ident) (ofs : ptrofs) : vmatch bc (Genv.symbol_address ge id ofs) (Ifptr (Gl id ofs)).
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold Genv.symbol_address.
destruct (Genv.find_symbol ge id) as [b|] eqn:F.
constructor.
constructor.
apply GENV; auto.
constructor.

fileSamples.statement:
(id : ident) (ofs : ptrofs) : vmatch bc
  match Genv.find_symbol ge id with
  | Some b => Vptr b ofs
  | None => Vundef
  end (Ifptr (Gl id ofs)).
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct (Genv.find_symbol ge id) as [b|] eqn:F.
constructor.
constructor.
apply GENV; auto.
constructor.

fileSamples.statement: (id : ident) (ofs : ptrofs) (b : block) (F : Genv.find_symbol ge id = Some b) : vmatch bc (Vptr b ofs) (Ifptr (Gl id ofs)).
(id : ident) (ofs : ptrofs) (b : block) (F : Genv.find_symbol ge id = Some b) : pmatch bc b ofs (Gl id ofs).
(id : ident) (ofs : ptrofs) (b : block) (F : Genv.find_symbol ge id = Some b) : bc b = BCglob id.
(id : ident) (ofs : ptrofs) (F : Genv.find_symbol ge id = None) : vmatch bc Vundef (Ifptr (Gl id ofs)).
(ofs : ptrofs) : vmatch bc (Vptr sp (Ptrofs.add Ptrofs.zero ofs)) (Ptr (Stk ofs)).
(n : float) (m : mem) : vmatch bc (Vfloat n) (if propagate_float_constants tt then F n else ntop).
(n : float32) (m : mem) : vmatch bc (Vsingle n) (if propagate_float_constants tt then FS n else ntop).
(ofs : ptrofs) (m : mem) : vmatch bc (Vptr sp (Ptrofs.add Ptrofs.zero ofs)) (Ptr (Stk ofs)).

(cond : condition) (vargs : list val) (m : mem) (aargs : list aval) (H0 : list_forall2 (vmatch bc) vargs aargs) : vmatch bc (Val.of_optbool (eval_condition cond vargs m))
  (of_optbool (eval_static_condition cond aargs)).
(cond : condition) (vargs : list val) (m : mem) (aargs : list aval) (H0 : list_forall2 (vmatch bc) vargs aargs) : cmatch (eval_condition cond vargs m) (eval_static_condition cond aargs).

(cond : condition) (ty : typ) (m : mem) (a1 a0 : val) (al0 : list val) (b1 : aval) (H1 : vmatch bc a1 b1) (b0 : aval) (bl0 : list aval) (H0 : vmatch bc a0 b0) (H3 : list_forall2 (vmatch bc) al0 bl0) : vmatch bc (Val.select (eval_condition cond al0 m) a1 a0 ty)
  (select (eval_static_condition cond bl0) b1 b0 ty).
